sentences.sContent: In the early 1900s, Sigmund Freud developed the psychodynamic view of human behavior.
sentences.sContent_eng: In the early 1900s, Sigmund Freud developed the psychodynamic view of human behavior.
sentences.sCn: 早在20世纪的初期，西格蒙德•弗洛伊德就开发了人类行为的精神动力观。

sentences.sContent: This observation has led to a "psychodynamic" interpretation of the individual's preference for the submissive/bottom or dominant/top role in a BDSM sexual encounter or scene.
sentences.sContent_eng: This observation has led to a "psychodynamic" interpretation of the individual's preference for the submissive/bottom or dominant/top role in a BDSM sexual encounter or scene.
sentences.sCn: 这种观察结果导致一种对在BDSM性接触或场景中的对服从/下位或统治/上位角色的个人喜好的“心理动力学”解释。

sentences.sContent: Gabbard echoed Ferri and Clemens in emphasizing that psychodynamic principles were crucial to all aspects of psychiatric practice, including inpatient care and psychopharmacology.
sentences.sContent_eng: Gabbard echoed Ferri and Clemens in emphasizing that psychodynamic principles were crucial to all aspects of psychiatric practice, including inpatient care and psychopharmacology.
sentences.sCn: 盖博得和费理，还有克莱门斯持有相同的意见，他们都强调，心理动力学原则，对于精神病学科的实践的各个方面，包括住院病人的看护以及精神药理学都是至关重要的。
